parameters.name: CheckUrl
parameters.description: The URL that is used for health checks.

parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description: The domain name that you want to accelerate. Wildcard domain names that start with periods (.) are supported. Example: .example.com.

parameters.name: Scope
parameters.description:
This parameter is applicable to users of level 3 or higher in the Chinese mainland and users outside the Chinese mainland. Default value: domestic. Valid values:

*   **domestic**: Chinese mainland
*   **overseas**: outside the Chinese mainland
*   **global**: regions in and outside the Chinese mainland

parameters.name: Sources
parameters.description: The information about the addresses of origin servers. For more information, see the **Sources** table in this topic.
